text: (visvasavantayini! yuddha kara) oba (jayagrahanaya samagada sarira suvayenda yutuva) ovun veta apasu pæmini avasthavedi oba veta ovun (pæmina yuddhayata noema gæna samava illa) prasamsa karannaha. (eyata nabiye! ovunta) oba mese pavasanu: “oba prasamsa nokaranu. api obava visvasa karannema næta. obage (vamcanika) karanavan niyata vasayenma allah apata dænum dunneya. allahda, ohuge dutayada itamat ikmanin obage kriyavan dæna gannaha. pasuva oba rahas ha norahas danna aya veta gena yanu labannehuya. oba karamin siti dæya e avasthavedi ohuma obata dænum denu æta”
